aws_vpc_peering_connection_accepter.description: Manage the accepter's side of a VPC Peering Connection.

vpc_peering_connection_id.description: The VPC Peering Connection ID to manage.

auto_accept.description: Whether or not to accept the peering request. Defaults to `false`.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The ID of the VPC Peering Connection.

accept_status.description: The status of the VPC Peering Connection request.

vpc_id.description: The ID of the accepter VPC.

peer_vpc_id.description: The ID of the requester VPC.

peer_owner_id.description: The AWS account ID of the owner of the requester VPC.

peer_region.description: The region of the accepter VPC.

accepter.description: A configuration block that describes [VPC Peering Connection]

requester.description: A configuration block that describes [VPC Peering Connection]
